articles.author: COLLEEN LONG
articles.title: Biden commutes roughly 1,500 sentences and pardons 39 people in biggest single-day act of clemency - The Associated Press
articles.description: President Joe Biden is commuting the sentences of roughly 1,500 people who were released from prison and placed on home confinement during the coronavirus pandemic and pardoning 39 Americans convicted of nonviolent crimes. The White House says it’s the larges…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President Joe Biden is commuting the sentences of roughly 1,500 people who were released from prison and placed on home confinement during the coronavirus pandemic and is pardoning 39… [+5096 chars]
